ingredients.ingredient: 1 (16 ounce) can maple cured baked beans
2 medium tomatoes, cut into 1/4 inch slices

cookingTips: Toast English muffins lightly before building the sandwich to prevent sogginess from the beans
Layer ingredients in order: beans, onion, tomato, cheese, and bacon for structural integrity
Bake until cheese is melted and bacon is crispy, about 10-12 minutes at 375Â°F
enrichment.coachingPrompt: How can you build an open-faced sandwich that remains structurally sound while melting cheese and crisping bacon?
